thread.title: True Leaders 2015: NSW Premier Mike Baird, Rosie Batty and Catherine Livingstone
thread.title_full: True Leaders 2015: NSW Premier Mike Baird, Rosie Batty and Catherine Livingstone | afr.com

author: AFR
title: True Leaders 2015: NSW Premier Mike Baird, Rosie Batty and Catherine Livingstone
text:
From left: Mike Baird NSW Premier, Rosie Batty Australian of the Year and Catherine Livingstone head of the Business Council of Austrlia. Nic Walker by AFR Each year BOSS celebrates the Australians who have shown genuine leadership across all areas of life. The True Leaders are chosen by a panel of prominent people from a long list comprised of nominations by readers.
The individuals selected as BOSS True Leaders 2015 have diverse backgrounds and champion different causes. Some have chosen to pursue positions of power and influence, others have had it thrust upon them. What unites them is the energy they draw on again and again to drive change, withstand criticism, and inspire others to join their cause.
They are the leaders who are making things happen.
To explore what makes them tick and the challenges they've faced, explore our interactive below.
This year's panel were Steve Tucker, Koda Capital chairman; Amanda Harkness, ASX Group general counsel and company secretary; Michael Traill, Social Ventures Australia executive director; Jane McAloon, Former BHP Billiton president, governance & group company secretary; and Toby Hall, St Vincents Health group CEO.
If all these people inspire you and you're left wondering 'what type of leader am I?' then take our personality quiz to find out .
